Just had my first boxing class and I absolutely loved it!
The energy was amazing, and everyone‚Äîfrom the fellow participants to the coach‚Äîwas incredibly welcoming and supportive. The coach were not only skilled but also super encouraging, making sure everyone felt comfortable regardless of experience level. I left feeling empowered, challenged, and already looking forward to my next session. Highly recommend to anyone looking to get fit, learn new skills, and be part of a great community!

King of Strength Boxing Gym - my son absolutely loves going there! Providing a safe and engaging environment for him to train. The coaches are excellent, especially Coach Aziz, who has a special way with kids. Elias thoroughly enjoys his time at the gym, thanks to the skilled and attentive coaching he receives.
Moreover, the gym offers an affordable membership package with unlimited monthly sessions, making it accessible for families who want to prioritize their child's fitness and skill development.

It's a very fun trial class experience, the coach is professional with the skills. He guide step by step not only fundamental start from foot work and also pad work.
I do enjoyed with the trial class.

Went for my first trial and the whole gym was very supportive for a beginner like me. Coach Aziz stood by around my corner always motivating and correcting my stance to achieve my goals. Thank you KOS!
